Virtualization is VMWARE. And you have 6 different datacenter to choose. I tested the Italian one and it ain't so good, Prometeus is much better located. I guess the best are UK, France and Germany. Offer here: https://www.arubacloud.com/vps/virtual-private-server-range.aspx[SIZE=14.3px] [/SIZE]
